title: Strategic design for integrating trade unions with workplace learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Labor Union Operations and Workplace Training Programs
context.additional_context: A project where current practitioners collaborate to derive improvement plans for labor union-company learning programs

learning_goals: Analyze case studies of the European steel industry to identify at least three limitations labor unions face in workplace learning programs
Investigate workplace learning needs based on learners' practical experiences and propose team-based instructional designs that reflect these requirements
Present and improve a sustainable learning model through project-based assessment that enables collaboration between labor unions and enterprises
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
